<<<<<<< HEAD
The tragicall history of the life and death of Doctor Faustus. Written by Ch. Marklin Doctor Faustus Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.
[62] p.
Printed for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop without Newgate, at the signe of the Bible, London : 1616.
Ch. Marklin = Christopher Marlowe. In verse. Signatures: A-H⁴ (-H4, blank?). Running title reads: The tragicall historie of Doctor Faustus. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
